answerText: The Weavers (or Die Weber)[10] This German dramatist used poetic verse to write about the bellmaker Heinrich and his encounter with a spirit of freedom in The Sunken Bell. He also penned The Weavers.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Yale A, OSU A | 1 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Identify this play in which workers like Becker become fed up with the abuses of the cashier Pfeifer and the industrialist Dreissiger.
